meanings.sent1: After the long hike, she felt overfatiguing and needed to rest.
meanings.sent2: The overfatiguing workout left him exhausted for the rest of the day.
meanings.sent3: The overfatiguing race made her legs feel like jelly.
meanings.sent4: The overfatiguing workload weighed heavily on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The overfatiguing heat drained all her energy.

meanings.sent1: He tends to overfatigue himself by working long hours without breaks.
meanings.sent2: Overfatiguing your muscles can lead to injuries during exercise.
meanings.sent3: The children overfatigued themselves playing in the park all day.
meanings.sent4: The intense training session overfatigued his body beyond its limits.
meanings.sent5: Avoid overfatiguing your mind with too much stress.
